title: Missing Champions and Skins - Please Help
body:
Game indicates I need to unlock certain heroes and skins that I purchased and played with previously. Don't know what happened. Was able to access them as recent as a few hours ago.

Reviewed my purchase history and noticed that certain purchases were "refunded." However, I never authorized this, nor have I received IP or RP back.

What's going on?

Edit: Just noticed I mystery gifted a bunch of stuff to someone named "PRELI" I dont know this guy. Please help! It appears I was hacked.

replies.body:
Hey CHEETIEN,

If you're noticing unauthorized purahces on your account, or if you're missing content, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34200) so we can investigate the issue.
